Title: Chapter Five: The Flea and the Acrobat
Writer: Matt Duffer (created by), Ross Duffer (created by), Alison Tatlock
Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard, Millie Bobby Brown
Plot: Hopper breaks into the lab to find the truth about Will's death. The boys try to locate the "gate" that will take them to Will.
